example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VRD (VV 做) (VV 出来)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 东西))) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 很)) (VP (VE 有) (NP-OBJ (NN 个人) (NN 风格)))) (PU 、) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 媚俗))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 好像)) (ADVP (AD 在)) (PP-DIR (P 向) (NP (NN 观众))) (VP (VV 说) (NP-OBJ (NN 故事))))))
example.arg: *OP* *pro* 做 出来 *T*-1 的 东西
